import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";// appApi
import appApi from"../services/appApi";const initialState=[];export const productSlice=createSlice({name:"products",initialState,reducers:{updateProducts:(_,action)=>{return action.payload;}},extraReducers:builder=>{builder.addMatcher(appApi.endpoints.createProduct.matchFulfilled,(_,_ref)=>{let{payload}=_ref;return payload;});builder.addMatcher(appApi.endpoints.updateProduct.matchFulfilled,(_,_ref2)=>{let{payload}=_ref2;return payload;});builder.addMatcher(appApi.endpoints.deleteProduct.matchFulfilled,(_,_ref3)=>{let{payload}=_ref3;return payload;});}});export const{updateProducts}=productSlice.actions;export default productSlice.reducer;
